channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.6)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.6)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.5.6 - 2023-10-17 # Changed # Make no-op as possible if no AAO component attached for your avatar #603 Error Report window is refreshed after exiting play mode #606 Removed # Error for Read/Write Mesh off Mesh #615 Since AAO creates Mesh every time, no more error is required!
